Detailed Description

Route class. Represents a route between two

Member Data Documentation

int TTREdge::cars [private]

Number of cars required to claim this route.

char TTREdge::col[2] [private]

Route colors. Double routes have two colors.

int TTREdge::engs [private]

Number of engines required to claim this route.

int TTREdge::id [private]

Edge id.

int TTREdge::nColors

2 if double route, 1 otherwise.

Edge source node reference.

TTRNode* TTREdge::nodeB [private]

Edge destination node.

TTRPlayer* TTREdge::owner[2] [private]

Route owners. Double routes may be owned by two players.

const int TTREdge::radix = 100 [static]

Radix value. Used to generate edge id from node ids.

TTRPlayer* TTREdge::station[2] [private]

Players that own a station on this route.

int TTREdge::tunnel [private]

Tunnel indicator. 1 if tunnel, 0 otherwise.

Route point value.
